mapper.select: SELECT CHAT_CON, TO_CHAR(CHAT_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD AM HH:MI') CHAT_DATE, SENDER, STATUS FROM CHAT_LOG WHERE ROOM_IDX = #{roomIdx} ORDER BY IDX
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_LOG VALUES (CHAT_LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{roomIdx}, #{chatCon}, DEFAULT, #{sender}, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE CHAT_LOG SET STATUS = 0 WHERE ROOM_IDX = #{roomIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT L.ROOM_IDX, L.SENDER, L.STATUS, M.AUTH FROM CHAT_LOG L INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON L.SENDER = M.USERNAME) WHERE AUTH != 'ROLE_ADMIN' AND STATUS = 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT L.ROOM_IDX, L.SENDER, L.STATUS, M.AUTH FROM CHAT_LOG L INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON L.SENDER = M.USERNAME) WHERE AUTH = 'ROLE_ADMIN' AND ROOM_IDX = (SELECT IDX FROM CHAT_ROOM WHERE MEMBER_IDX = (SELECT IDX FROM MEMBER WHERE USERNAME = #{username}) AND END_DATE IS NULL) AND STATUS = 1
